module_restrictions: Students who wish to take master level classes must request permission to do so prior to arrival.
visa_info: All students coming to study at Sciences Po for longer than 3 months who come from a non-EU member state must apply for a residence permit in order to reside in France.
accommodations_info: Being located in the heart of Paris, Sciences Po does not offer on-campus housing. Students are responsible to find accommodation on their own and are encouraged to start searching early. The university has a service set up to help students find accommodation in France while studying.
